page.title: 09CLUBS IN MARKFIELD SWIMMING
page.content: On Monday night I go training for Coalville Swimming Club at Whitwick Leisure Centre. I train from 8.40 to 9.20 p.m. We do all sorts of things including 16 lengths front crawl and 4x2 individual medley. We swim quite late but I enjoy it. On Tuesday I go to County training at Desford pool. The teacher is called Martin Thomas. He is a Welsh and Commonwealth champion. I swim from 6.30 until 8.00p.m. On Saturday I am usually in a gala. We go all over the county. I usually go by bus but sometimes I go by car.
